name: Windskull
description:
Windskull is an action rpg that follows the tale of Windskull trying to take back his hat from the evil Obsidiskull.

Follow him as he journeys throughout the land to take back what is rightfully his!

This game was made in a week for the Brackeys game jam. This time the theme was: Rewind

Controls

If you feel like using WASD instead of the arrow keys for movement, at any point press "CTRL + Y" this will open up a controls menu where you can change your controls to any buttons you feel like :)
